remarks: If the difference between the restricting class of a restricted class abstraction and the restricted class abstraction is empty, the restricting class is equal to this restricted class abstraction. (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 3-Aug-2018.)
statement:
difrab0eqim $p |- ( V = { x e. V | ph } -> ( V \ { x e. V | ph } ) = (/) ) $.
$d V x $.
